item.title: SQL Baisc
item.description: Some vocabulary: Normalization: Itâ€™s the process of maintaining as less data as possible in a database. Benefit of doing so include saving space and easy tracking data. Columns are called fields Rows are called records Primary Keys: They are the minimum numbers of columns to uniquely identify a row. Example Database Diagram Database Name: KCC Four table Name: dbo.Orders, dbo.Customers, dbo.Order_Product, dbo.Product Figure 1: Example Database diagram
